Articles.Content:
It crashes about 10 to 30 seconds into flight. I have not application running in the background and I am running the latest drivers for everything.

Here are the logs

https://drive.google.com/open?id=16YuzawFc_m_3FA2iuIkoNB5bsOM8J6Ki

 

I have allowed the game through my firewall (Windows Defender)

Edited May 10, 2020 by PatelPratham

404 page not found on your log files. Try starting at the bottom and searching up for exceptions and crash reports, even knowing what type of crash it is can help resolve it.

A few suggestions- if you downloaded the game through Steam, check the file integrity using Steam; try running the game using OpenGL by creating a shortcut to the KSP executable and changing the link to add —force-opengl at the end which may resolve some graphics related issues; check your graphics drivers are up to date, this can cause DX11 crashes.

Just to confirm you have zero mods installed?

No mods installed. Also I noticed that when I turn anti aliasing off it does not crash. I’ll fix the link so you can see the logs

I fixed the link
I can live without anti aliasing, but when ever I install mods like restock it freezes and crashes again
